review: This is probably the worst piece of hardware i've ever purchased. It constantly reboots itself. The rare times when its not just rebooting over and over, you'll get about 30 seconds of playback before it buffers, or loses network connection. This isn't a problem with my internet or router - my chromecast works just fine.
author: Aaron Brown

review: I have Sony ps3 since 4 years and it worked great for it's time. It got noisy and started dropping network but I am satisfied as it served my needs for quite a time. I purchased roku3 and Fire stick. Roku 3 is fastest device I have ever used, even better than ps3. You click on Netflix and within 3 seconds you are in. Not only Netflix, roku3 is fast in all the apps. Fire stick is the worst I have ever seen, I kept for 3 days and returned cause it doesn't catch network at all while roku3 is sitting right next to it and giving blazing speed. I put router right next to tv and fire stick started showing some action but I can't even watch single episode without buffer every 10 minutes. I saw positive reviews about fire stick so I am sure I got bad piece but I wrote whatever I experienced.
author: nikhil bhanderi

review: I love this.  It is so easy to use.  I had purchased another item like this and could never get it to work.  I plugged in my fire stick and it took me right to a instruction screen on my TV and setting everything up was a breeze.  I would recommend this to others for sure.
